about_the_game:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 0.50

As the sun sets over the ancient North American wilderness, a new chapter unfolds in Neolithic Dawn. In this latest update, our journey through 10,000 BC brings you face-to-face with the mighty bears, expansive new regions to explore, and exhilarating challenges. Your feedback has been our guiding star, and we're thrilled to present these updates. Embrace the call of the wild and immerse yourself in this Stone Age adventure!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Hi, I'm James, the lead developer of Neolithic Dawn. Thank you for your support, This would not be possible without you!



Welcome to Neolithic Dawn, the ultimate VR survival experience! Step into the shoes of a Neolithic hunter-gatherer and struggle to survive in a harsh and unforgiving world. Hunt wild animals for food, tame creatures to help you on your journey, and craft the tools and weapons you'll need to stay alive.

Explore a vast and immersive world based on the real-life landscape of 10,000 BC North America. From the icy tundra to the dense forests, every inch of the environment has been meticulously recreated to provide a historically accurate and breathtakingly realistic experience.

But be warned, this isn't just any survival game - it's a physics-based permadeath adventure. Every decision you make has consequences, and death is permanent. Can you rise to the challenge and emerge victorious in this brutal world?

Experience the ultimate VR survival game and embark on a journey through the Neolithic era in Neolithic Dawn.



Features:
Advanced Physics - experience the world around you in a truly immersive way. The environment and animals are 100% science based so you can interact with them as you would in the real world
Online Co-Op - Play alongside your tribe in cooperative multiplayer! Together we will rebuild the old world on top of the new world
Cross Platform - Whether you have a beastly PC Setup with padded walls or going for a Quest on the bus, you’ll never miss out on the fun!
Streamer Support - Stream & Capture incredible shots with built in game camera tools as well as LIV integration.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus PC, or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Neolithic Dawn is an open-world primitive survival game built exclusively for VR. Play as a lineage of 10,000 BC hunter / gatherers on a journey too great for one lifetime. Fight prehistoric beasts, or tame them to aid in your survival!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
